confirmations.approve-message: This will approve the idea and send it to the content generation pipeline. This action will create content based on the approved idea.
confirmations.delete-message: This will permanently delete the idea and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

mascot-message: Review and manage your content idea details.

quick-actions.description: Perform common tasks related to this idea.
quick-actions.title: Quick Actions

rationale.description: AI reasoning behind the confidence score
rationale.title: Score Rationale

stats.confidence-score-description: AI confidence in this idea's potential
stats.total-keywords-description: Total keywords associated with this idea

toasts.approve-success: Idea approved successfully and sent to content generation
